sense.def:
A pretence
je vedênje, s katerim želimo druge prepričati, da bi verjeli nekaj, kar ni res.

seg.quote: She leapt up with a pretence of eagerness.
The industry has abandoned any pretence of restraint.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
under false pretences
, tisto naredimo, ko ljudje ne poznajo resnice o nas in naših namerah.

seg.quote: I felt that I was taking money under false pretences.
